content.body: Is `class C { @(decFun) m() {} }` allowed in decorators? It seems to be, based on Decorators Playground.

content.body: `console.log |> @(decFun) function f(param) { @(param) }` will be pretty difficult to parse, both for mind and matter. Fortunately it will probably be rare.
